page.title: 05 St.Paternus
page.content: The church is administered by a travelling vicar. Weekly worship performed at village churches in turn. The attendance in the main is older people. The school carol service and rememberance sevices are held.There is a{LYCH GATE}less than 100 years old and provides a setting for weddings. A sundial is set vertically over the south porch inscribed A.D.1821"D.K. KINGDOM Esq.RICHARD HAWKE Esq,church wardens".The Hawkes have been wardens for over 300 years and are still actively farming.Many people sign the visitors book from abroad and home. Some have family links with the parish. Modern acquisitions to the church include underfloor heating, electricity storage heaters and lights. Oldest complete gravestone dated 1731 bearing the name NATHANIEL REED.
